description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes and layout of a React application. It defines CSS variables for light and dark themes, styles for the main application components, animations, and responsive design media queries.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application style that sets the text alignment, background color, and color for text, with a minimum height for the viewport.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the application, including background color, layout properties, and responsive behavior.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover effects.
